search.header.title: Search Results
search.loading.title: Loading Results
search.available.title: Services available to create
search.available.descriptions.postgres: Open-source relational DB with ACID compliance, robust transactions, advanced types (JSONB, arrays), and extensions like PostGIS; suitable for OLTP/OLAP workloads.
search.available.descriptions.mysql: Widely used relational DB, good performance and replication, InnoDB engine by default; common in web apps.
search.available.descriptions.mariadb: MySQL fork, compatible with performance optimizations and extra features (storage engines and advanced capabilities).
search.available.descriptions.mongodb: Document-oriented NoSQL database (BSON) with flexible schema, horizontal scalability, and rich queries with indexes.
search.available.descriptions.redis: In-memory key‑value store with data structures, ultra‑low latency, pub/sub, and optional persistence; ideal for cache, queues, and rate limiting.
search.available.descriptions.couchdb: Document database with master‑master replication and offline sync, HTTP/JSON API, and revision-based conflict control.
search.available.descriptions.cassandra: Distributed wide-column store, high availability and linear scalability, eventual consistency, optimized for writes.
search.available.descriptions.elasticsea: Distributed search and analytics engine based on Lucene; full‑text indexing, aggregations, and near real-time queries.
search.available.descriptions.influxdb: Time-series database optimized for metrics and logs, with retention, downsampling, and query languages (Flux/InfluxQL).
search.available.descriptions.generic: Generic database category; choose the type according to application requirements.
search.network.card.description: User custom network to connect applications on Dokku
